name: Dell Inspiron 15 5520 Intel Core i5 12th Gen (15.6 inch, 16GB, 512GB, Windows 11, MS Office 2021, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Graphics, FHD LED-Backlit Display, Dark Shadow Grey, D560822WIN9B)

prod_desc.heading: Why buy Dell Inspiron 15-5520 (D560822WIN9B) Core i5 12th Gen Windows 11 Home Gaming Laptop
features: 12th Generation Intel Core i5-12500H offers a seamless functionality
NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Graphics Card for powerful gaming performance
16GB DDR5 Dual-Channel Memory securely stores all your data
Windows 11 Operating System to keep you updated
sub_features: This season get your hands on the Dell Inspiron 15-5520 (D560822WIN9B) Core i5 12th Gen Windows 11 Home Gaming Laptop. Equipped with a 15.6" FHD AG WVA LED-Backlit display with 1920x1080 resolution, this gaming laptop takes your visual experience to the next level. The powerful NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti graphics card accelerates its performance ensuring an uninterrupted and smooth user interface. It comes onboard with high-quality 16GB DDR5-4800 MHz memory and a significant 512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe solid-state hard drive which allows you to work and store your data efficiently. The advanced windows 11 simplifies the complex data transportation process maximizing your productivity immensely. Considering its amazing attributes, the price of Dell Inspiron 15-5520 (D560822WIN9B) Core i5 12th Gen Windows 11 Home Gaming Laptop seems quite fair.

Apart from these outstanding features the Dell Inspiron 15-5520 (D560822WIN9B) Core i5 12th Gen Windows 11 Home Gaming Laptop is designed with a 56Wh 3 cell battery which delivers an admirable running time. The US English orange qwerty backlit keyboard with a numeric keypad gives the laptop a sleek touch. The built-in G-key activates the game mode triggering a performance boost that allows the processors to run energetically. The Dell G-series is developed with Alienware Command Center easing the accessibility of divergent gaming information. Moreover, these best-in-class specs are immuned by McAfee multi-device security software for optimum protection. These magnificent flairs are covered under 1-year of premium service. In a word, the Dell Inspiron 15-5520 (D560822WIN9B) Core i5 12th Gen Windows 11 Home Gaming Laptop is a blend of sleek design and cutting-edge technology. So, what are you waiting for? Get the Dell Inspiron 15-5520 (D560822WIN9B) Core i5 12th Gen Windows 11 Home Gaming Laptop online, now!

faqs.que: How long do Dell laptops usually last?
faqs.ans: Most experts estimate a laptop's lifespan to be three to five years. It may survive longer than that, but its utility will be limited as the components become less capable of running advanced applications.

faqs.que: How many years Dell battery lasts?
faqs.ans: When Should I Consider Replacing the Battery? All rechargeable batteries wear out with time and usage. As time and cumulative use increase, the performance will degrade. For the typical user, noticeable reduction in run time generally will be observed after 18 to 24 months.

faqs.que: At what percentage should I charge my Dell laptop?
faqs.ans: The recommended charging time should not exceed 1 hour. Typically, this should charge the battery to between 80% and 100%. (Some discharge will take place over time.)

faqs.que: How do I keep my laptop battery healthy?
faqs.ans: Like all batteries, lithium-ion cells age and deteriorate over time and with use. To help extend battery life and performance, try to keep the battery level between 20% and 80% several times a week instead of using your device for only a short amount of time, and then plugging it in to recharge the battery.
